item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“TheDecline, post:6, topic:152372”][quote author=fook link=topic=208429.msg1829275#msg1829275 date=1192734838]
trust me theres no anti-autoer team monitering clicks, its just reines and a few ingame mods
[/quote]
You will be banned. To be honest, mopar should know that no one uses scar on rsc, and any rsc scar scripts posted will be used for rscd. I know this is a cheating community, but you should respect Reines. He has put a lot of time and effort into making this for people to enjoy playing on. If you auto on it you will be banned because Reines and others are going to make sure rscd does not get ruined by autoers.[/quote]
True…

But this is still a cheating community.

Read full topic

item.title: [RSCD] all in one powerfisher v2.4 updated 17/11/07
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

This is a script i myself have wrote for rsdaemon(RSCD) which is a highly active rsc private server that has been set up by Reines of SYI/Reinet.

The script still needs testers, report any bugs here, should work fine from what ive tested.

features…
mod detection
summoned detection
auto relogin
fishes anything (bait,lure,cage,net,harpoon)
sleeping
settable replys to summon and mod detection

instructions
start logged in
sleeping bag in slot 1
start standing above the desired fishing spot
have public chat turned off

v2.2 features/fixes
now scans for when ur tired, then sleeps as opposed to clicking the sleeping bag after fishing 20 times

v2.3 features/fixes
a few client changes made the mods phats change from yellow to green, this is been fixed so mod detection will work fine again.

[code]

// RSCD all-in-one powerfisher by fooktard v2.4
//
// Directions: target RSCD client with crosshair
// scroll down to line
//
// PROTIPS:
// Try 2 fish in a secluded area with only 1 or 2 fishing spots
// too many spots on the screen tents to make the script try 2
// fish them all which means alot of walking around which can
// be annoying.
//
// To change what the script does go to line 199 and in the
// “findbitmap(???,x,y)” comand change the ??? to either…
// “net” “bait” “lure” “cage” “harpoon”
//
// Start script with camera faced ABOVE ur disired fishing spot
//
// HAVE PUBLIC CHAT TURNED OFF 2 STOP PEOPLE FUCKING WITH THE MOD DETECTION!!
// phat 4, 330, 19, 342 <-- ignore these.
// summoned 5,329,225,342 <–

program powerfisher;

const
watercolor1 = 12433592; //sparkling water colors go here
watercolor2 = 8289404;
watercolor3 = 5976092;
delay = 2000 ;
modmsg = ‘hey man :(’; //change this to what u want the script 2 make ur char say if a mod is detected
summondmsg = ‘what?’; // change this to what the want the script to say if ur summoned 2 a mod
brbmsg = ‘brb 2 seconds gettin a bita lag checking my router’; //the script says this msg after the mod msg and then terminates, leaving u standing there for
//5 mins until you logout which looks alot more human like than just logging out on the spot
var
x,y,net,bait,lure,tootired,harpoon,cage,clickhere,forsupport,sorry,errorunable,thatusername,banned,modphat1,modphat2,summonedtwo: integer;

procedure loaddmps;
begin
net := BitmapFromString(39, 9, ‘z78DA737343000312811B097A21’ +
‘6AC8B1855A66E272AD1B0E805F0D71AE425689CBB598EAF1AB21E’ +
‘C774C7712E32FEAC529797E2727F406B74F894F2784C5F1BB1F7F’ +
‘1AA68D4F2949BDD48953DA9448A4C61D79E97C38E553727C4A7CD’ +
‘94B8A7F073EF58E1C0000708CC8A4’);

bait := BitmapFromString(18, 9, ‘z78DA333040003724604031C06’ +
‘F1A2E59371C00BF5EF2D413E32A5245F0871E7EDF1123426A1852’ +
‘2242AA9943C52E62E2CB0D2F20D555F40100FE73DDF5’);

lure := BitmapFromString(24, 5, ‘z78DA3330C007DC90007E715C2’ +
‘A4935C780EEEEC10506CA3D061400FCF6D222BE88093D626C2726’ +
‘0488B10B0089BFA35D’);

cage := BitmapFromString(23, 7, ‘z78DA33300001373030C0006E4’ +
‘8801811FC2AF18BE3B79D12F3297109A92140BC5EFCBE23C69DB4’ +
‘0813E2636430A413E243923C7BC90B255201E5B600009296DC51’);

harpoon := BitmapFromString(39, 8, ‘z78DA7373C30E0C90801B5E’ +
‘35C488106F1AA92A49B59D12BD948700B554926A02253EA585FB6’ +
‘9A77278FB945AA977E4F87460F329A9399AF2381DD8B297D41298’ +
‘78400B33690100B342B088’);

clickhere := BitmapFromString(107, 5, ‘z78DA33304000372440B’ +
‘C08E57A31811B06A0857BF0AB27DECDA4EAA5AE99B408134A5412’ +
‘E397814A45C4E8A27F180EAD1448BBF8A5AE1F07730A242F54890’ +
‘F43E2CB4FE25D3B5C5320F1650575C387F872805A299072BDB433’ +
‘935473865F0A24AFFD434928E14A8D03D5C618AD8587773B107F0’ +
‘A0400510ADDFF’);

     forsupport := BitmapFromString(112, 5, 'z78DAED56410E002008' +
   'FA92AFF0FF4FEA0535142CDBE458BA11926A76820340B2CEE7C8A' +
   'DC13CF9F828C3DCBB6E66315AA9F8F0FA57F833577D0BA203C3FE' +
   '592A7FF27C1C86B62FBDF267D4A5E3CFF1A76A1630E075FB77BE7' +
   '7AEA9AAD67D66AE760FC9FD5FD5368E77890A0DF94E55B147EDB0' +
   '005DD3FC2F');
   
     sorry := BitmapFromString(38, 7, 'z78DA737303010312811B5E40' +
   '9E7A37A2017EF3A96B1A7E3389D145891A5C22A4FA11BF5E62DC4' +
   '08C2E4AD4D0C2C6A1E8474A5C4B5E5AA58F1F494DB7D42D7328F1' +
   '2325B99B78D7926AD760F02300A3C470EC');
   
     errorunable := BitmapFromString(72, 7, 'z78DAED55DB0900210C' +
   '5BA953B8FF48E2B72879F5E0C07E16344943D3AA5503AE7AD55CC' +
   '8B43547F6575AE7F427CB19578173C01171B62CBAA314E1705784' +
   '4C83D5C5E680EF574A97368714136D5F7056DA26F6F9E564148B9' +
   '2F5AB2F8D53F3E9464CA5E297F7EBF9E55CA53FFAA5E561CA2F07' +
   '917DA5F527BBD7A3EB');
   
     thatusername := BitmapFromString(98, 7, 'z78DAD597D11180300' +
   '84357620AF61FC95FEF542E2150219F152DA4AFB49ABDCB6F3238' +
   'C61F42DEFD8AF750162A8EC49FE666547C3BE36DC7BC56C412BEE' +
   'E78FC7996D85A7279EAB557E5EF82BA5962BFC0AE6F55FEDD39B3' +
   'C44EF336376EA5675C55679BC092DE61948AFEF576174BC8497D9' +
   'E2596A8992CE9DE6E61A96A5CEFEA33CFDF09DE6E6449D9FBEC5F' +
   '55C7DD55AF688EB7FADEB9006DA5AD92');
   
     banned := BitmapFromString(118, 5, 'z78DAED56410E803008FB12' +
   'AFD8FF9FE4D5682494D2CE443932C64A691811575B277BF2447AE' +
   'B6E7BE3EBA7AB6C3D54685D39C2A93C8A78B40B75F67AEFF27A98' +
   'F2E7FA516898418EAAD78F81674681B6D71D855651967AF13A967' +
   '40CA82703FA2330F35F8196E15997F9D7B0BFAED93FF79B1A7EE7' +
   '2EE19C36CE5D82D90D14DD71327600DA922E7E');

modphat1 := BitmapFromString(15, 11, ‘z78DA33301829C0C8D4D’ +
‘2D4C0C0D0C2CC08551C53048B5E172713547370998CAC122A82A1’ +
‘1ED3649C24582FA638154CC641D2CE64A85F464D26DA6432CD473’ +
‘21300F481C62B’);

     modphat2 := BitmapFromString(13, 12, 'z78DA33301805E8C0D1C2' +
   'D1C2D4D5CCCDCCCDD815591C5304029C9D9C9DCC8D90F5E2320D5' +
   '9254404533D440D2E12A21E539C3CD37091D4350D62CE48368D3C' +
   '3391CD01002C74CA8E');

summonedtwo := BitmapFromString(58, 7, ‘z78DADD56410A002008’ +
‘FB92AFE8FF4F8A6E42189BCB8A76149BBA6C6436D01C2C8878B40’ +
‘073CEFA2CCEC6F2E47A66A743AA473C51049F7457E7088F32B592’ +
‘B9AB3AAE525DDD338A9DCF5474C3DDA04E5B7C1FD8CDB97B5FAC4’ +
‘3B27EAB57D1336F6DB8F22E5EF6DB6AC572DAFEF44F98E31D7AB6’ +
‘3C5F’);

     tootired := BitmapFromString(67, 13, 'z78DAED56410EC0200CFA92AFF' +
   '0FF4FDAD564C986A5588D70D45AB034DAD68C9DD1FBFFEE77CC9D' +
   '9551F3BED9EDC5298E8CEBCC595C559612863D9633C6AEA833E30' +
   '8723B241BAFA1AA02787CAD1E3B52EB089233F662D8115D7FC6D4' +
   'AAFFD6531C51F4A75F2D66D2C89AB566B3654D3BEB672DC3308C7' +
   'DF1007C8DFB3E');

end;

procedure rightclicking;
begin
If(findcolor(x,y,watercolor1,209, 207, 304, 277))or
(findcolor(x,y,watercolor2,209, 207, 304, 277))or
(findcolor(x,y,watercolor3,209, 207, 304, 277))then
begin
wait(delay+random(50));
clickmouse(x,y,false);
end;
end;

procedure logdouttest;
begin
If(findbitmap(forsupport,x,y))or
(findbitmap(sorry,x,y))or
(findbitmap(thatusername,x,y))or
(findbitmap(errorunable,x,y))then
begin
wait(200)
clickmouse(253, 315,true);
wait(200)
clickmouse(418, 275,true);
wait(5000)
movemouse(259, 220);
wait(200)
clickmouse(259, 220,true);
end;
end;

procedure banscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(banned,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘account banned script terminating lulz’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure modscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(modphat1,x,y))OR
(findbitmap(modphat2,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘possible mod detected, ending script saying “brb” looking like a natural AFK logout over 5mins’);
wait(4000)
sendkeys(modmsg +chr(13));
wait(8000)
sendkeys(brbmsg +chr(13));
TerminateScript; // script terminates leaving 5min logout thing 2 log u out automaticly
end;
end;

procedure summonedscan;
begin
if(findbitmap(summonedtwo,x,y))then
begin
writeln(‘a mod has summoned u! logging out’);
wait(4000)
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
sendkeys(summondmsg +chr(13));
clickmouse(328, 44,true);
wait(3000)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
wait(600)
clickmouse(369, 307,true);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;

procedure clickingbmp;
begin
wait(500)
findbitmap(harpoon,x,y);
wait(1200)
movemouse(x,y);
wait(200)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘fishing’);
end;

procedure sleep;
begin
wait(2000);
if(findbitmap(tootired,x,y))then
begin
Wait(200);
writeln(‘we are tired, nap time!’);
MoveMouse(492,40);
Wait(500);
Movemouse (296, 60);
Wait(1000);
ClickMouse(296, 76, True);
Wait(3000);
Movemouse (200, 200);
end;
end;

begin
loaddmps;
repeat
rightclicking;
clickingbmp;
logdouttest;
banscan;
modscan;
summonedscan;
sleep;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: [RSCD] all in one powerfisher v2.4 updated 17/11/07
